price: "Zašto da se ne uzdamo u Allaha kad nas je On putevima kojim idemo uputio? Mi ćemo, doista, strpljivo podnositi ono čime nas uznemiravate - a oni koji se uzdaju, neka se samo u Allaha uzdaju!"
arabic: وَمَا لَنَآ أَلَّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ وَقَدۡ هَدَىٰنَا سُبُلَنَاۚ وَلَنَصۡبِرَنَّ عَلَىٰ مَآ ءَاذَيۡتُمُونَاۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُتَوَكِّلُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wamā lanā allā natawakkala ʿalā al-lahi waqad hadānā subulanā walanaṣbiranna ʿalā mā ādhaytumūnā waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mutawakilūna
translations: And surely we will bear with patience
